mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter Sent from Ellen Stigleman Addressed to Capt. C. M. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated August 7, 1861 to “My Dear Doctor,” sent from Ellen at Snowville addressed to Capt. C. M. Stigleman at Tudor Hall. 2 original pieces – letter and envelope and 4 photocopied pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
